name: Winter Gloves Women Men Cold Weather Touch Screen 3-Layers Liner Glove for Running, Cycling, Biking, Hiking, Driving
short_description: COMFORT & DAILY WARMTH: 3-layer build with a wind-blocking mid-layer and 320 gsm fleece delivers warmth without bulk for winter/cold weather. Best use 32–50 °F; under 25 °F, layer with a shell for extended outings.
SENSITIVE 3-FINGER TOUCHSCREEN: Conductive yarn on thumb/index/middle works with touchscreen phone, iPhone, iPad, tablets, GPS—easy texting and maps for commuting, cycling, running, hiking, driving.

WATER-REPELLENT & WIND-BLOCKING: water-repellent outer handles small rains and road spray; the mid-layer helps seal out cold wind. For steady rain/snow or all-day wet rides, pair with a waterproof shell.
SECURE GRIP & ALL-ROUND OUTDOOR USE: Durable silicone palm gives a sure grip with a flexible, lightweight feel. Great for cycling, running, hiking, camping, bicycle/bike rides, driving.

SECOND-SKIN FIT + 1-YEAR QUALITY SUPPORT: Luxury-soft knit and 4-way stretch deliver second-skin comfort with a cozy fleece interior for all-day wear. Gift-ready and built to last—backed by 1-year quality support.

name: -10℉ Waterproof Winter Gloves for Men & Women, 5-Layer Ski & Snow Gloves for Cold Weather, Breathable Warm Gloves with Touch Screen Fingers
short_description: 【UPGRADED 5-LAYER INSULATION FOR SUPERIOR WARMTH & DEXTERITY】 Experience exceptional warmth without the bulk. These gloves are constructed with 5 distinct thermal layers, including premium 3M insulation and a soft, skin-friendly Polar Fleece lining to keep hands toasty even in temperatures as low as -10℉. Despite their incredible warmth, they remain lightweight and pack

【10-FINGER TOUCHSCREEN SENSITIVITY FOR INSTANT ACCESS】 Never freeze your hands to send a text again. Unlike standard gloves, all 10 fingers are equipped with highly sensitive, non-slip PU conductive leather. You can answer calls, text, and snap photos on any touchscreen device seamlessly. Plus, the palms and fingertips feature an enlarged silicone grip pattern, providing superior control for driving, cycling, and handling your phone safely.

【DOUBLE-LAYER WATERPROOF & WINDPROOF PROTECTION】 Keep your hands dry in rain or snow with our dual-action moisture barrier. The outer shell features high-density water-resistant nylon, while an internal breathable TPU membrane blocks external moisture while allowing sweat to escape. Combined with elastic wrist cuffs that seal out freezing wind, these gloves are the ultimate solution for staying dry and comfortable during wet winter activities.

【PREMIUM CRAFTSMANSHIP & SMART DESIGN | PERFECT GIFT】 We’ve focused on the details that matter: invisible inner stitching for chafe-free comfort, an auto-adjusting concealed wristband for heat retention, and a durable, upgraded zipper for a custom fit. The built-in portable buckle keeps your gloves paired together to prevent loss. Available in unisex sizing, they make a thoughtful and practical gift for friends and family this holiday season.

【VERSATILE SIZING & DEDICATED SUPPORT】 Choose from 4 precise sizes for a tailored fit. These gloves are engineered to perform in cool-to-frigid temperatures during high-output activities like skiing, snowboarding, shoveling, cycling, hiking, and dog walking. We stand behind our quality; if you have any questions or sizing concerns, please contact us immediately for a prompt and helpful response.

short_description: RIVMOUNT winter gloves with touchscreen fingers for women and men is lightweight, waterproof, windproof and upgrade warmer
Stylish in Appearance, Outstanding in Performance

【Keep Warm, Windproof and Waterproof】RIVMOUNT Winter Gloves are designed to keep your hands warm and comfortable in freezing winter. The skin-friendly waterproof fabric outer, soft and dense fleece lining, and adjustable windproof cuff provide excellent cold resistance. It will keep your hands stay warm and dry, whether you're running, driving or biking. The RIVMOUNT Winter Gloves for women mens, integrating stylish and performance, are a great pick for cold weather.

【Lightweight, Soft and Dextrous 】These lightweight and water-resistant gloves are perfect for daily life and winter work. It can keep your hands warm and dry even on snow or light rain days. They are super warm , comfy, and moisture resistant, but not bulky at all. Whether you're shoveling snow, sledding, cycling, hiking, camping, commuting, or engaging in indoor outdoor chores, RIVMOUNT Warm Gloves are the ideal choice. Stay warm and protected in stylish design, providing good flexibility.

【Sensitive Touchscreen】Our womens and mens gloves both feature a highly sensitive touch screen function, all fingers made of sensitive conductive fabrics. You can easily operate your phone without taking off the thermal gloves, allowing you to stay connected and productive. It is great for phone use, like answering calls or texting, or for working with devices. These phone gloves will be a perfect fit for walking dog, jogging, delivery, skiing, snowmobiling, snowboarding, hunting or camping.

【No-slip Palm & Safety Design】The PU leather palm with anti-slip design enhances grip and abrasion resistance. You can confidently hold the steering wheel while driving, and securely handle your phone without the fear of dropping it. Plus, there are reflection patterns on the back of the bike gloves. It can reflect light and improve the safety of cycling at night. Safety and convenience at your fingertips. Perfect for anyone who likes to go out for a walk or play outside on a cold weather day.

【More Humanized Design & After Service】The portable buckle makes it convenient to carry and keep them always in a pair. The adjustable cuffs facilitates the wearing and removal. And you can also adjust the tightness freely by it. The fineest craft and quality material are definitely worth your investment, they are the ideal gifts for your friends and families. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, our dedicated customer service team is always here to assist you. Try them risk-free now.
